properties.description: The Abbey Chapel in Tavistock are opening their doors to offer a safe and warm space for members of the local community. Abbey Chapel will be opening its doors on Saturdays from 10.30am - 12.30pm. Refreshments available. properties.description: A food hub operating our of King's church in Tavistock. Anyone coming along can pick up a bagful of food that would otherwise go to waste for £5. They have a small café offering free hot drinks and Danish pastries. They also offer an affordable food club where they deliver larger food boxes to the Tavistock area for £15 a box. Services: Free hot drinks and pastries; Device charging; People to talk to; Affordable food boxes
properties.title: Tavistock Food Hub
